clues.text: Town which was the setting for "Green Acres"

Raise a ruckus

Civil War doctor who invented a cotton planter as well as a famous machine gun

One dot in Braille symbolizes this letter meaning "one"

Fitts' law of movement is used in human engineering, also called this, partly from Greek for "work"

rounds.text: A 1953 article by this pair says, "The specific pairing we have postulated... suggests a... copying mechanism for the genetic material"
